Text: Just a heads up... this torrent is missing #11. Despite that, thanks blackcanary and welcome to TPB! I hope to see more torrents from you...
You're awesome for putting this up. I've been having to search for the files all over the place. Nice to see someone spread the love of LDB and put up the whole series.
Thank you! Yeah, it's nice to know LDB is up for everyone to enjoy. :)
